labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to provide real-time access to EVE Online market data, including prices, orders, and statistics. It offers detailed market analysis capabilities and supports structure-specific order retrieval. The server simplifies integration with EVE Online's ESI API, enabling dynamic market insights through authenticated and paginated requests. Tools include fetching market prices, orders, history, statistics, and authentication methods for secure access.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of the server revolves around retrieving, analyzing, and providing insights into EVE Online's market data, which aligns closely with the "Data Analysis & Processing" category. The server's integration with the ESI API and focus on market statistics also makes "API Integration" a relevant secondary label. Given the server's real-time data capabilities and the need for authenticated access, no custom label is necessary as the predefined categories adequately cover its functionality.

tools.name: get-market-prices
tools.description: Get market prices for all items in EVE Online

tools.name: get-market-orders
tools.description: Get market orders from a specific region

region_id.description: Region ID to get market orders from

type_id.description: Item type ID to filter orders

tools.name: get-market-history
tools.description: Get market history for a specific item in a region

region_id.description: Region ID to get market history from

type_id.description: Item type ID to get history for

tools.name: get-market-groups
tools.description: Get grouped market data for a region and type

region_id.description: Region ID to get market groups from

type_id.description: Item type ID to get groups for

tools.name: get-structure-orders
tools.description: Get all market orders in a structure

structure_id.description: Structure ID to get market orders from

page.description: Which page to query, starts at 1

tools.name: get-market-stats
tools.description: Get market statistics for a region

region_id.description: Region ID to get statistics from

tools.name: get-structure-type-orders
tools.description: Get all market orders for a specific type in a structure

structure_id.description: Structure ID to get market orders from

type_id.description: Item type ID to get orders for

page.description: Which page to query, starts at 1

tools.name: get-auth-url
tools.description: Get the authentication URL for EVE Online SSO

tools.name: authenticate
tools.description: Exchange authorization code for access token

code.description: Authorization code from EVE Online SSO

tools.name: refresh-token
tools.description: Refresh an expired access token

Enable detailed market analysis and structure-specific order retrieval with support for authentication and pagination. Simplify integration with EVE Online's ESI API for dynamic market insights.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@kongyo2/eve-online-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
